title: (x) Interior Design - (similar to) Publius {Norbert}
content:
This one has us all stumped. Any help is greatly appreciated. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [SAMHAL-logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108172927/http:/typophile.com/files/SAMHAL-logo.gif) | 16.14 KB |
author: printninja

comments.content:
Penned forms in a loose "Carolingian" style are so hard to exactly match since they've grown like weeds in so many "freebie" font sites.

Except for the cap "R" you can come close to replicating the sample with [Publius](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108172927/http:/www.fontcraft.com/scriptorium/previews/publius.jpg) if you "embold" and extend the characters.

Sorry, that's all I could find.

------------------------------------  
Yes, I'm old, but I'm back in style!

Norbert,

Wow, good match! That puts me way ahead of the game, and it's a fairly inexpensive font to boot. Many thanks!

Bill B
